name: rke
description:
A Pulumi package for creating and managing rke cloud resources.

> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/rancher/terraform-provider-rke)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi/pulumi-rke` repo](https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-rke/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`rancher/terraform-provider-rke` repo](https://github.com/rancher/terraform-provider-rke/issues).

provider.description:
The provider type for the rke package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

> This content is derived from https://github.com/rancher/terraform-provider-rke/blob/master/website/docs/index.html.markdown.

addonJobTimeout.description: RKE k8s cluster addon deployment timeout in seconds for status check

addons.description: RKE k8s cluster user addons YAML manifest to be deployed

addonsIncludes.description: RKE k8s cluster user addons YAML manifest urls or paths to be deployed

apiServerUrl.description: RKE k8s cluster api server url

authorization.description: RKE k8s cluster authorization mode configuration

bastionHost.description: RKE k8s cluster bastion Host configuration

cloudProvider.description: RKE k8s cluster cloud provider configuration

clusterName.description: RKE k8s cluster name used in the kube config

controlPlaneHosts.description: RKE k8s cluster control plane nodes

customCerts.description: Use custom certificates from a cert dir

delayOnCreation.description: RKE k8s cluster delay on creation

dindDnsServer.description: RKE k8s cluster dind storage driver (experimental)

dindStorageDriver.description: RKE k8s cluster dind storage driver (experimental)

disablePortCheck.description: Enable/Disable RKE k8s cluster port checking

ignoreDockerVersion.description: Enable/Disable RKE k8s cluster strict docker version checking

ingress.description: RKE k8s cluster ingress controller configuration

internalKubeConfigYaml.description: RKE k8s cluster internal kube config yaml

kubeConfigYaml.description: RKE k8s cluster kube config yaml

kubernetesVersion.description: K8s version to deploy (if kubernetes image is specified, image version takes precedence)

privateRegistries.description: RKE k8s cluster private docker registries

rotateCertificates.description: RKE k8s cluster rotate certificates configuration

runningSystemImages.description: RKE k8s cluster running system images list

systemImages.description: RKE k8s cluster system images list

updateOnly.description: Skip idempotent deployment of control and etcd plane
